title: Japanese Core 2000: Step 5
description: Welcome to Step 5 of the Japanese Core 2000. Mastering all the items in the Core 1000 and Core 2000 will give you a very strong foundation in Japanese. Not only will you understand dialogue in most basic situations, you'll also start to develop skills for reading on your own.

series.name: Japanese Core 2000
series.short_description:
Mastering all the items in the Core 1000 and Core 2000 will give you a very strong foundation in Japanese.

Not only will you understand dialogue in most basic situations, you’ll also start to develop skills for reading on your own.
